NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PHLOX: Papa, can we play the jellyfish game tonight? 2 1 PLUME: I'm afraid not, Phlox.. The thick clouds on this stormy planet never seem to part, even as its storms calm. 3 1 COLEUS: It will be hard to play the jellyfish game if we cannot even see the skies! 4 3 PHLOX: Oh, but papa! Coleus taught me a way to play the jellyfish game - even without being able to see the skies! 5 4 PLUME: I wish I could teach you, papa.. But Coleus told me not to tell you, to make the game more even! 6 5 PHLOX: How curious! I suppose this will make it less of a game of pure chance, then. 7 6 PLUME: Let us put this trick Coleus has taught you to the test then, my little dwarf star! LC EX3 2
